description: Ready in three steps, this easy dinner recipe packs a flavour punch. Sweet and sticky BBQ pork chops go perfectly with the crisp veggie and noodle salad.
keywords: Vietnamese-style BBQ Pork With Noodles & Salad
name: Vietnamese-style BBQ Pork With Noodles & Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600 g Woolworths BBQ pork chops with sweet & sticky Vietnamese inspired glaze

recipeInstructions.text: Toss carrot, cucumber, onion, chilli and coriander in a large bowl. Arrange pork chops, noodles and salad on plates. Drizzle over dressing to serve.
